products.title: Milwaukee M12 FUEL 12V Lithium-Ion Brushless Cordless 4-in-1 Installation 3/8 in. Drill Driver Kit and 3.0 Ah Battery (2-Pack) 2505-22-48-11-2412
products.description: Delivers powerful performance for drilling and driving applications. Features a high-efficiency brushless motor for longer runtime and extended tool life. Compact design allows access to tight spaces while the ergonomic grip reduces fatigue during extended use.
highlights: Brushless motor delivers up to 57% more runtime
Compact design fits into tight spaces
All-metal transmission for durability
LED light illuminates work area

questionsAndAnswers.question: Does this come with a battery and charger?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: This depends on the specific kit you purchase. The 'tool only' version does not include a battery or charger. The kit version includes both. Please check the product title for details.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is this compatible with my existing batteries?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, this tool is compatible with all batteries from the same voltage platform. For example, all 20V MAX batteries work with all 20V MAX tools from the same brand.
